name: QprayersDaily
0:
”Alexa open q time vedic prayers”
”Alexa ask q time vedic prayers for sooktha”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: q. time vedic prayers
des:
Prayers are the inspirational ways to begin a day no matter how you are feeling on that day, mentally or physically. Wake up to these prayers to vitalize your each day of the week with specific Vedic hymns for the day of the week. 
The skill plays Vedic hymns and prayers in Sanskrit language. The audio is in Sanskrit language.
New short prayers have been added to facilitate easier learning paths to understand lengthy hymns at later stages of learning.
